item.title: HP Stream notebooks include a complimentary one-year subscription to Office 365 and OneDrive
item.description:
HP has introduced two new notebook PCs to its HP Stream line of lightweight, cloud-based Windows devices. HP emphasizes affordability, offering these thin and light notebooks at a lower price point than typically seen. Source: HP. The HP Stream notebooks come in horizon blue and orchid magenta. “Consumers today want mobile devices that reflect their style and empower them to work and play from anywhere,” says Serena Yong, General Manager for Printing & Personal Systems at HP Singapore and Malaysia...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/hp-stream-notebooks-include-a-complimentary-one-year-subscription-to-office-365-and-onedrive/

item.title: Shopee Malaysia is showing support for breast cancer awareness by going pink
item.description:
Shopee, a popular online marketplace in Malaysia, is partnering with the Pink Ribbon Deeds (PRIDE) Foundation for a “Goes Pink” campaign throughout October to raise awareness about breast cancer. The campaign involves both online and offline initiatives. Shopee’s “Goes Pink” collection features pink and white products across various categories like mobile accessories, beauty products, and home goods, encouraging users to purchase and show their support. With over 2 million app installs in Malaysia, Shopee aims to leverage its platform to spread awareness nationwide...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/shopee-malaysia-is-showing-support-for-breast-cancer-awareness-by-going-pink/
